name: X-Drift
description:
X-DRIFT is a minimalist, yet colorful, experience inspired by arcade racing classics like Hang-On, OutRun, and Pole Position. Reach the end of one of three stages in a race against the clock while avoiding the mud and grass.

This game can also be played with a PS4 controller.

PS4 controls:
Left joystick: Steer
X button: Accelerate
Square button (while accelerating): Sharp steering
X button (on menu or level select screen): Advance
